means: （在餐桌旁）招待，侍应，作仆人（或店员、服务员等）
Helicopter Electronic Landing Path 直升飞机电子着陆系统

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"帮助"之意。
means: aid ：正式用词，指帮助他人脱离危险或战胜困难，着重强者对急需帮助的弱者的帮助。
assist ：强调在提供帮助时，以受助者为主，所给的帮助起第二位或从属的作用。
help ：最普通用词，含义广泛。指一般性的或迫切需要的帮助，侧重积极地为他人提供物质、精神或其他方面的帮助。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"帮助，支持"之意。
means: help ： 最普通用词，可以与aid和assistance换用。help强调使受助者达到目的或侧重受助者对帮助的需要。
aid比help正式，侧重受助者处于困难或危险境地急需救助。
assistance ： 正式用词，通常指帮助完成不太重要的那一部分工作。
support ： 强调在迫切需要时给予支持或鼓励。

sentence.Network_en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentence.Network_en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentence.Network_en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentence.Network_cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

lj.lj_ly: she was always ready to lend a helping hand.
lj.lj_ls: 她总是乐于伸出援助之手。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to emphasize that one means what one is saying
jx.jx_cn_mean: （上帝）作证（用于强调某人说话算话）

phrase.cizu_name: there is no help for it

jx.jx_en_mean: there is no way of avoiding or remedying a situation
jx.jx_cn_mean: （情形、处境）无可避免，无法补救

jx.jx_cn_mean: 自用：用…招待自己或提供…给自己
【非正式用语】 偷窃，窃取：没有得到允许而拿取（某物）

lj.lj_ly: The thief helped himself to our family silver.
lj.lj_ls: 小偷窃取了我家的银子

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English helpan (verb), help (noun), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch helpen and German helfen

encyclopedia.content: 约翰·列侬1980年接受‘花花公子’杂志David Sheff的采访时说：“1965年推出《Help!》时，叫救命的人应当是我才对。人们大多认为这是一支快节奏的摇滚歌曲，当时我自己却不这么认为。这是我为电影写的任务歌曲。可后来，我还真要嚷嚷‘救命’了。因为电影中我演的是Elvis全盛时期的那段。他表演技能好，活性十足，发挥尽情。

entry.def: If you help someone, you make it easier for them to do something, for example by doing part of the work for them or by giving them advice or money.

example.ex: He has helped to raise a lot of money...
example.tran: 他帮着筹集了很多钱。

example.ex: My mum used to help cook the meals for the children...
example.tran: 我妈妈过去常帮忙给孩子做饭。

entry.def: If you say that something helps, you mean that it makes something easier to do or get, or that it improves a situation to some extent.

example.ex: The right style of swimsuit can help to hide, minimise or emphasise what you want it to...
example.tran: 款式选择得当的泳装有助于按照意愿掩饰、缩小或突出某些部位。

example.ex: Building more motorways and bypasses will help the environment by reducing pollution and traffic jams in towns and cities...
example.tran: 建造更多的高速公路和绕城道路能够减少城镇中的污染和交通堵塞，有利于改善环境。

entry.def: If you help someone go somewhere or move in some way, you give them support so that they can move more easily.

example.ex: Martin helped Tanya over the rail...
example.tran: 马丁扶着塔尼娅越过栏杆。

example.ex: I allowed her to help me to my feet...
example.tran: 我允许她扶我站起来。

entry.def: If you help yourself, you try to get yourself out of a difficult situation rather than accept it and think you can do nothing to change it.

example.ex: He tries to help people with problems, but firmly believes they should do more to help themselves.
example.tran: 他尽力帮助有困难的人，但仍坚信他们应该更加努力自救。

entry.tran: 帮助解决困难的人（或事物）
entry.def: If you say that someone or something has been a help or has been some help, you mean that they have helped you to solve a problem.

example.ex: Thank you. You've been a great help already.
example.tran: 谢谢你。你已经帮了大忙了。

example.ex: ...a quality which will be a help rather than a hindrance to them...
example.tran: 会对他们有所助益而非阻碍的一种品质

entry.def: Help is action taken to rescue a person who is in danger. You shout 'help!' when you are in danger in order to attract someone's attention so that they can come and rescue you.

example.ex: He was screaming for help...
example.tran: 他高呼求救。

example.ex: 'Help!' I screamed, turning to run.
example.tran: “救命！”我尖叫道，转身就跑。

entry.def: In computing, help, or the help menu, is a file that gives you information and advice, for example about how to use a particular program.

example.ex: If you get stuck, click on Help.
example.tran: 如果碰到疑难，就点击“帮助”。

entry.def: If you help yourself to something, you serve yourself or you take it for yourself. If someone tells you to help yourself, they are telling you politely to serve yourself anything you want or to take anything you want.

example.ex: There's bread on the table. Help yourself...
example.tran: 桌上有面包。你自己拿吧。

example.ex: Just help yourself to leaflets.
example.tran: 请自取传单材料。

entry.def: If someone helps themselves to something, they steal it.

example.ex: Has somebody helped himself to some film star's diamonds?
example.tran: 有人偷了某个影星的钻石了吗？

entry.def: If you can't help the way you feel or behave, you cannot control it or stop it happening. You can also say that you can't help yourself .

example.ex: I can't help feeling sorry for the poor man...
example.tran: 我不禁为这个可怜的男人感到难过。

example.ex: 'Please don't cry.' — 'I can't help it.'...
example.tran: “别哭了。”——“我忍不住。”

entry.tran: （用于委婉地表示观点）不免，禁不住（想）
entry.def: If you say you can't help thinking something, you are expressing your opinion in an indirect way, often because you think it seems rude.

example.ex: I can't help feeling that this may just be another of her schemes...
example.tran: 我不免觉得这可能只是她的又一个诡计。

example.ex: I could not help but think this is a very queer life.
example.tran: 我忍不住会认为这是一种非常怪异的生活。

entry.def: If someone or something is of help, they make a situation easier or better.

example.ex: Can I be of help to you?
example.tran: 我能帮上你吗？

means.word_mean: 1. the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "he gave me an assist with the housework"

means.word_mean: 4. a person who contributes to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "they hired additional help to finish the work"

means.word_mean: 1. give help or assistance; be of service;

sentences.sentence: "Can you help me carry this table?"

means.word_mean: 4. abstain from doing; always used with a negative;

sentences.sentence: "I can't help myself--I have to smoke"
"She could not help watching the sad spectacle"
"This money will help the development of literacy in developing countries"
"New slipcovers will help the old living room furniture"

means.word_mean: 7. help to some food; help with food or drink;

sentences.sentence: "I served him three times, and after that he helped himself"
"She helped herself to some of the office supplies"

auth_sentence.content: The organisations listed below will help get you playing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The organisations listed below will help get you playing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The organisations listed below will help get you playing.

auth_sentence.content: The biggest region to ask for help is Catalonia.
auth_sentence.res_content: The biggest region to ask for help is Catalonia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The biggest region to ask for help is Catalonia.

auth_sentence.content: The album's title probably doesn't help either.
auth_sentence.res_content: The album's title probably doesn't help either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The album's title probably doesn't help either.

abbreviation.mean_cn: 高能级充气汽车保险杠

sentences.en: We'll be happy to help if you need us.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要的话, 我们将乐意帮助你。

means.word_mean: 避免; 抑制, 克制

sentences.en: She burst her crying; she couldn't help it.
sentences.cn: 她放声大哭, 无法控制自己。

sentences.en: We should help her, it's too difficult for her to feed five children by herself.
sentences.cn: 就她自己要养活五个孩子太困难了，我们应该资助她。

sentences.en: I helped him (to) find his wallet.
sentences.cn: 我帮他找到了他丢失的钱包。

means.word_mean: 给…盛(饭、菜)；为…倒(酒、饮料)；劝(酒等)(与 to连用)

sentences.en: They helped each other to the dish.

means.word_mean: [与 can或 cannot连用]避免，防止，阻止；改变，抑制，忍住，控制住

sentences.en: I can not help beating him.
sentences.cn: 我控制不住打了他一顿。
约翰对吉尔的宝贵帮助表示谢意。

means.word_mean: 补救办法, 治疗方法

sentences.en: It was past the help of man.
sentences.cn: 它不是人力所能挽救的。

jushi.english: We'll be happy to help if you need us.
jushi.chinese: 如果你需要的话,我们将乐意帮助你。
救人啊!救人啊!一个男孩子要淹死了。

jushi.english: I've got about 30 pence, will that help?
jushi.chinese: 我身上带着大约30便士,管用吗?
